statements: DELETE FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE player_id = 123 AND total_sessions > 10;
DELETE FROM game_design WHERE game_id = 2005 AND total_revenue > 5000;
DELETE FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE player_id = 100 AND total_playtime > 50.00;
DELETE FROM game_design WHERE release_date < '2021-01-01' AND total_revenue < 1000.00;
DELETE FROM player_metrics WHERE player_id = 100 AND total_playtime > 5000;
DELETE FROM player_feedback WHERE game_id = 5 AND rating < 3 OR player_id = 2;
DELETE FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = 100 AND session_date < '2022-01-01';
